title: Is this a 1950 women's magazine to film "The Predators"?
subtitle: An ad for the Old Women's magazine of Colt Cobra's weapon to be used against that perverted stranger who won't leave you alone.
author: David Emery
vclaim: A magazine announcement from the '50s called a gun to use women with the slogan "Very strange, perverted infiltrator who won't leave you alone."
